rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: Notification is triggered when a request is pending approval
rule.condition: approval.status in $L.file="pending" and (not (same(approval.status in $L.file, approval.status in $L.file.save)) or same(approval.status in $L.file.save, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( approval.status in CurrentRecord = "pending" AND ( approval.status in CurrentRecord != approval.status in SavedRecord OR approval.status in SavedRecord = NULL))

rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: Notification is triggered when a request is pending approval (when ( approval.status in CurrentRecord = "pending" AND ( approval.status in CurrentRecord != approval.status in SavedRecord OR approval.status in SavedRecord = NULL)))
